scripts.Regression-Chrome-Dashboard: npx cypress-tags run -e TAGS="@regression" --record --key c32b4dc7-deb8-4ad4-a130-5d9ffee0df92 --headed --browser chrome
scripts.InProgress-Chrome-Dashboard: npx cypress-tags run -e TAGS="@inProgress" --record --key c32b4dc7-deb8-4ad4-a130-5d9ffee0df92 --headed --browser chrome
scripts.Smoke-Chrome-Dashboard: npx cypress-tags run -e TAGS="@smoke" --record --key c32b4dc7-deb8-4ad4-a130-5d9ffee0df92 --headed --browser chrome
scripts.Smoke-allBrowsers-Dashboard: npm run Smoke-Dashboard -- --browser electron --headed & npm run Smoke-Dashboard -- --browser chrome --headed & npm run Smoke-Dashboard -- --browser firefox --headed & npm run Smoke-Dashboard -- --browser edge --headed
